sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import { Link, useLocation } from "react-router-dom";
import { FaHome, FaCalendarAlt, FaUserMd, FaClipboardList, FaClock, FaSignOutAlt, FaMapMarkedAlt } from "react-icons/fa";

const TopNav = () => {
  const location = useLocation();

  const navItemStyle = (path) =>
    `flex flex-col items-center text-xs px-2 ${location.pathname === path ? "text-white font-bold" : "text-blue-200"}`;

  return (
    <nav className="flex justify-around bg-blue-700 py-3 rounded-md shadow-md mb-4">
      <Link to="/" className={navItemStyle("/")}>
        <FaHome className="text-lg mb-1" />
        Home
      </Link>
      <Link to="/booking" className={navItemStyle("/book")}>
        <FaCalendarAlt className="text-lg mb-1" />
        Book now
      </Link>
      <Link to="/choose-doctor" className={navItemStyle("/choose-doctor")}>
        <FaUserMd className="text-lg mb-1" />
        Doctors
      </Link>
      <Link to="/date-appointment" className={navItemStyle("/date-appointment")}>
        <FaClock className="text-lg mb-1" />
        Date Appt.
      </Link>
      <Link to="/booking-history" className={navItemStyle("/booking-history")}>
        <FaClipboardList className="text-lg mb-1" />
        Booking History
      </Link>
      <Link to="/manage-locations" className={navItemStyle("/manage-locations")}>
        <FaMapMarkedAlt className="text-lg mb-1" />
        Manage
      </Link>
      <Link to="/logout" className={navItemStyle("/logout")}>
        <FaSignOutAlt className="text-lg mb-1" />
        Logout
      </Link>
    </nav>
  );
};

export default TopNav;
